entry.title: Operation: Beyond the Veil
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,207Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 0

Summary: World peace has finally arrived—and the Justice League is savoring every second. All except Bruce, whose sharp instincts sense the storm approaching while the rest of the world relaxs. He was right. When the Circle of the Black Blood resurges under the command of the vengeful Archmage Vikram Seth, a confrontation in Mumbai ends in tragedy: Bruce, Oliver, and Shayera are struck by an arcane curse that causes black rosebushes to sprout from their wounds, consuming them alive. With time running out and conventional magic failing, Clark is forced to break through Bruce's final barrier and reveal a secret not even the League knew: the existence of two interdimensionaly powerful mages living hidden right under everyone's noses… in Gotham. Now, the League's last hope rests with Bruce's most closely guarded friends—and the magical sanctuary they call home.

entry.title: The Batgirls and Robin
entry.summary:
Author: kayleesworks822

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,384Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 7

Summary: After Cassandra Cain returns to Gotham, She and the rest of the Bat-family are summoned to the Batcave for a life altering announcement. As the world of Gotham changes forever, Cassandra and Stephanie grapple with the changing dynamics between themselves and their hometown as a new serial killer emerges from the fog to terrorize the city they swore to protect. Can Stephanie and Cassandra's evolving love (and a little help from the newest addition to their family) save their city from near ruin? Set after Batgirl (2024).

entry.title: Not The Picture Perfect Figure I Thought You'd Be
entry.summary:
Author: Nikiclix

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,588Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 159

Summary: The batfamily gets into a fight and gets hit by a spell that drops them to the past where Bruce is six years old. They meet Bruce's parents but Thomas wasn't what they thought he'd be like from the stories Bruce told them. Ft. Emotionally repressed b who loves his kids deeply but can't seem to tell them that   ————— Written for Whumptober day 26 "Nothing like a relapse to rehash the kid who was scared."   Ps: please give this a chance i swear it's better than it seems TT

entry.summary:
Author: kikabennet

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,246Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

entry.title: Why Can't Anything Be Simple?
entry.summary:
Author: Megamagic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,974Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 388

Summary: Green Lantern and Batman are sent to another planet to try to stop a war that would consume a vast part of the galaxy.However in the middle of the mission the planet is attacked by a power hungry species who thrive on war. To protect the lives of everyone on the planet Batman surrenders himself to the leader of the species. Who is fascinated by making the man his pet. The Justice League rush to rescue their teammate but are met with many road blocks along the way. (Be aware this is a WIP and the tags are not updated fully. This is going to be a dark one so please re-check tags with every new chapter I post.)

entry.title: In Alternate Relation
entry.summary:
Author: Effi_Bee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,211Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 423

Summary: As he lay on his back in the snow, his soon to be murderer already long gone, he couldn’t help but find this situation ironically funny. How it started this way; a bullet lodging itself into a chest. The start and-however pathetic-end of Spider-Man. He had gone full circle now. Hilarious. or Peter Benjamin Parker dies in his world alone and forgotten, only to appear in a different dimension on a different earth in an unknown city with mysterious heroes. Vigilantes? Or are they just urban legends? He decides to start a new chapter in his-new-life, because isn't that what you do when you are supposed to be dead? You move on. (It doesn't matter that it's not really working. It's the effort that counts.) or Another Peter Parker in Gotham fic, but with a twist (and make it Nightswinger).

entry.title: Gotham Harbor
entry.summary:
Author: thebatdadnomad (aylooktaekook)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,104Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 129

Summary: “Bruce, you’re self-destructing,” Tim cut in, and the room went silent for a tense moment as he absorbed the assertion. The pair of them eyed him down with their respective devices – a laptop and a duster – in hand, as he considered leaving now or admitting it all like his lips so direly wanted to do. But Bruce’s mind told him no. Or, Bruce hurts his family so he can drown himself in Gotham Harbor.

entry.title: Chapter 3; Twilight
entry.summary:
Author: Corvix_Ailuranthrope_4313

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,431Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Safeguard 27 had been a success, The Second Bruce Batman had protected Gotham with everything he had, but nothing lasts forever, including the age of The Second Batman. Now we enter The Twilight of the City. A calm has started to spread over The City, but will it last? Or is something lurking in the dark? Whatever it is, Batman will find it and like the Batmen before him, he will give everything for his City.

entry.title: I Wear The Black
entry.summary:
Author: Gezmall

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,252Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 76

Summary: There is an impostor running around Gotham. A billowing figure tanking gunshots like they were confetti. He wore the bat-symbol like it was his own, but with spikes across his shoulders and back, making it clear he was not the friendly type. The cape, large and reflecting no light, split by the end in tendrils, which attached themselves to the ceiling and the sprawled bodies and the columns like itty-bitty grappling hooks. No. Not like grappling hooks per se, Nightwing numbly noted. Like small batclaws. "That was not Batman," Nightwing reminisced with more ease than he felt. "There's a fairily," he raised his hand where the real Batman's height ended, "big difference."

entry.title: The Batcouch
entry.summary:

entry.title: Bruce Goes Batty
entry.summary:
Author: AtlasDaMoth

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,797Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 815

Summary: In Bruce Wayne's opinion, as The Batman and Gotham's Billionaire, magic was both incredibly illogical, and quite stupid. Guns, swords, secret plots and evil schemes, he could deal with it all. Except for magic. Spells, curses, it was all unknown to him, and he hated it.He formed that idea on the subject at least a good three years ago. And now, as he stares at himself in the mirror, shaking hands gripping the long bat ears that had sprouted upon his head, he finds himself proven right yet again.Magic. Stupid, stupid magic.
